name: 40 Winks: Better Sleep Made Easy
description: Achieve your optimal sleep experience with personalized recommendations based on your specific situation.

name: Achieve Your Goals
description: Build a step-by-step plan for your chosen goal and set milestone reminders to track your progress.

name: Artificial Intelligence Quiz
description: Understand AI risks and test your knowledge of some of the risks it poses!

name: Astrology Challenge
description: We tested the predictive power of astrology. Professional astrologers couldn't beat our test. Can you?

name: Become A Great Listener
description: Learn about Active Listening — a powerful skill used by therapists, hostage negotiators, and helpline responders to foster connection.

name: Biosafety Quiz
description: Uncover the history of pandemics, test your biosafety knowledge, and learn essential steps to safeguard humanity's future.

name: Boost Your Productivity
description: Craft a productivity system that works for you. Apply our tested formula to optimize your time, efficiency, and output.

name: Building Happiness Habits
description: Pair these tried and tested happiness techniques with simple activity triggers to rapidly improve your day-to-day experience.

name: Calibrate Your Judgment
description: Sharpen your numerical calibration with thousands of tailored question sets. Track your progress over time to see how you improve!

name: Can You Detect Weak Arguments?
description: Find out how well you can spot misleading rhetoric and recognize your own bias using real-world examples.

name: Career Fulfillment Diagnostic
description: Find fulfillment in your career using the Japanese concept of Ikigai — your "reason for getting up in the morning."

name: Change Behavior for the Better
description: Transform your habits using the "Ten Conditions for Change" framework, guiding you through every step for lasting improvement.

name: Charity Effectiveness
description: See if you can guess which social interventions had a positive effect, a negative effect, or no effect.

name: Clearer Thinking Paths
description: Receive a custom itinerary of educational modules tailored to your personal needs, interests, and goals.

name: Cognitive Assessment
description: Uncover your cognitive strengths and understand where your intellectual strengths and weaknesses lie.

name: Credentialist Test
description: Do you care about formal qualifications? Find out where you fall on the Credentialist to Non-Credentialist spectrum.

name: Daily Ritual: A Habit Creation System
description: Develop a customized habit-formation strategy in three simple steps to improve your daily routine.

name: Defining Emotions
description: Explore the meaning behind the words we use for emotions and their physical sensations, so you can better express your feelings.

name: Design Your Own Self-Experiment
description: Devise informal experiments to improve your everyday experience and personal routines.

name: Effective Trust Repair
description: Learn how to repair your relationships by constructing or requesting effective apologies.

name: Emotional Obstacles to Doing Good
description: Want to make the world better? Emotions can either help or hold you back. Understand and manage them to maximize your impact.

name: Enhancing Creativity
description: Learn simple techniques to form new creative habits and applications.

name: Explanation Freeze
description: How do you interpret uncertain events? This mini-course teaches you how to look past your first explanation and get closer to the truth.

name: Fail-Safing Your Plans
description: Use the "Prospective Hindsight" technique to think through your future plans with greater depth and clarity.

name: Faulty Reasoning Quiz
description: Can you spot bad reasoning? Learn about five types of faulty arguments and see how well you can spot them!

name: Flexible Thinking
description: Learn a flexible thinking technique to help when you find yourself stressed, upset, or not thinking as clearly or objectively as you'd like.

name: Gender Continuum Test
description: Explore the connection between gender and personality, drawing on data from 15,000+ people, and learn something new about yourself.

name: Get Going: Overcome Procrastination
description: Tips for being more productive for those who frequently procrastinate on personal or professional projects.

name: Guess Which Experiments Replicate
description: Can you guess which high-profile experiments were legit?

name: Have Better Conversations with Yourself
description: Meet and befriend the parts of yourself that drive you. Understand your internal conflicts more clearly with the internal family systems model.

name: How Airtight Are Your Estimates?
description: Are your guesses truly independent? Or is it possible that you're being manipulated by irrelevant information without your knowledge?

name: How Other People Can Make You Irrational
description: Discover how the social aspects of our lives cause us to act in all sorts of irrational ways, and what you can do about it!

name: How Rational Are You, Really?
description: Learn which of 16 reasoning styles you use, your overall level of rationality, and what you can do now to improve your rationality skills.

name: Improve Your Frequency Predictions
description: Test your ability to estimate the frequency of events and compare your scores to others.

name: Is It A Cult? (The Cult Assessment Tool)
description: Discover whether you or someone you know might be in a harmful cult.

name: Is Your Memory Like A Photograph?
description: Discover whether you retain a faithful representation of the events you witness with two quick memory tests.

name: Kind and Effective Communication (NVC)
description: Learn the techniques of Non-Violent Communication (NVC) to build stronger relationships.

name: Learn Your Philosophical Beliefs
description: Discover your philosophical beliefs and whether they are predicted by your psychological traits.

name: Learning From Mistakes
description: Learning from mistakes is challenging. Rebound from mistakes and grow stronger with our structured approach.

name: Leaving Your Mark on the World
description: Have a greater impact on the world by understanding the essential principles of doing the most good.

name: Life Changing Questions
description: Answer these open-ended questions (alone or with others) to learn new, important insights about yourself.

name: Lifetime Aspirations
description: Create a life-improvement plan that will become your road map for achieving your most important goals.

name: Long-Term Future Quiz
description: Discover what opportunities may await humanity if we avoid disasters like nuclear war and climate change.

name: Make Your Work More Joyful
description: Work out in which areas you can improve your work experience, and make a plan to do it.

name: Managing Arguments in Relationships
description: Learn how to navigate arguments effectively and kindly using a situation of your choosing.

name: Mental Traps
description: Understand cognitive biases (the systematic thinking errors that affect your decisions) and learn how to recognize them in everyday life.

name: Mood Boosters
description: Brighten your disposition fast with scientifically-tested exercises that can improve your mood and dispel the blues.

name: Nuanced Thinking Techniques
description: Learn to recognize 3 common binary thinking traps and learn the nuanced thinking techniques you can use to combat them.

name: Overconfidence Analyzer
description: Discover how accurate your confidence levels are likely to be for any skill.

name: Pathkeeper
description: Track your goals and progress to stay on target and achieve more, with optional accountability features.

name: Political Bias Test
description: Learn how to spot and overcome your political biases, and test your policy knowledge!

name: Practice Self-Compassion
description: See how self-compassionate you are, then learn and practice two simple techniques to help develop more self-compassion.

name: Predict Correlations
description: How well do you understand human psychology? Predict how strongly agreement with one statement correlates with agreement with another.

name: Productive Disagreements
description: Strengthen your relationships through constructive arguments. Practice arguing with an A.I. to hone your communication skills!

name: Program Yourself to Improve Your Life
description: Train yourself to implement positive actions in your day-to-day life with simple "if-then" rules.

name: Question Your Identity
description: Why do you believe what you do? Learn how the way you see yourself influences the beliefs that you choose to hold.

name: Reframing Negative Emotions
description: Learn to reframe upsetting situations, find alternatives to self-criticism, and tap into past strengths to move forward.

name: Replace Unhelpful Coping Strategies
description: Learn which coping strategies backfire and how to replace them with healthier long-term approaches.

name: Resolve Harmful Situations
description: Facing a challenging or harmful situation? Think through your options with a simple decision-making framework.

name: Retrocaster
description: Sharpen your prediction skills by finding the hidden trends in charts about global problems.

name: Rhetorical Fallacies
description: Bad arguments are all around us. Train yourself to instantly detect common reasoning errors that often go unnoticed.

name: Savor Your Life
description: Learn a skill from positive psychology to boost happiness, lift your mood, and build lasting positivity.

name: Seeking Outside Criticism
description: Make a plan to ask for specific, honest criticism on an aspect of yourself that you'd like to improve.

name: Skeptical Seekers
description: Do you have the personality traits that help uncover true things about the world? Find out in minutes.

name: Spark the Mood You Want
description: Create A Mood Association: learn to generate a mental state of your choice in the situation you want using a quick, reliable technique.

name: Surpass Self-Limiting Beliefs
description: False or exaggerated beliefs about ourselves can hold us back and harm our relationships. Learn to overcome them with three simple strategies!

name: Tactics for Happier Living
description: Receive a tailored set of activities that can support you in adding fulfillment and meaning to your life.

name: The Art of Collaboration
description: Get tips for better collaborative structures, and our checklist for effective collaboration.

name: The Belief Challenger
description: Refine your beliefs and form more accurate views by examining the connection between what you believe and how you act.

name: The Common Misconceptions Test
description: Separate fact from B.S. while identifying the misconceptions among 30 common beliefs.

name: The Confrontation Aid
description: Learn the skills to have an effective confrontation using techniques recommended by experts in conflict resolution.

name: The Decision Advisor
description: Organize your thoughts and weigh options numerically when facing challenging, complex, or emotionally charged decisions.

name: The Entrepreneur Test
description: Assess your strengths and weaknesses as a potential startup founder. See if you have what it takes to succeed!

name: The Hidden Meaning of Sounds
description: Learn about how certain sounds can have a particular connotation or meaning by finding out what sound fits your personality best.

name: The Imposter Syndrome Test
description: Discover your experiences with imposter syndrome and learn strategies to combat imposter feelings.

name: The Intrinsic Values Test
description: Find out what you value most in the world, and compare those values to others'.

name: The Planning Fallacy
description: Ever notice projects take longer than expected? Learn why and become a more reliable planner.

name: The Question of Evidence
description: Sharpen your predictions by learning about Bayes' rule and interpreting evidence more effectively.

name: The Relationship Review
description: Examine different aspects of your relationship with a partner, close friend, or family member using an open, non-judgmental approach.

name: The Sunk Cost Fallacy
description: When we have invested heavily in a project, it can be difficult to evaluate it objectively. Learn about why this happens and how to combat it.

name: The Ultimate Personality Test
description: Find out which of our 16 personality types fits you best. And discover your Jungian (MBTI-inspired), Enneagram, and Big Five traits.

name: Uncover Your Guiding Principles
description: Build a list of simple rules to help you make better decisions, faster.

name: Understanding Bayes Theorem
description: Learn the mathematical rule that governs the way statisticians and scientists handle evidence.

name: Value Of Your Time Calculator
description: Make better decisions based on the value of your time, such as whether to take on more part-time work or hire help.

name: What Causes Match Your Values?
description: Find a charity that matches your altruistic priorities and is highly effective at advancing its chosen mission.

name: What Makes an Effective Goal?
description: Learn techniques on how to set effective goals, and accomplish more in less time.

name: What to Know About Suicide
description: Tips on how to recognize if someone is at risk of suicide and advice on how to speak to them about it from experts in suicide prevention.

name: When Are You Overconfident?
description: Get a clearer sense of how you rate your own reasoning chops - and how your confidence compares to others.

name: When To Stop Exploring
description: Make confident decisions when uncertainty strikes — discover a simple method to weigh options or commit to what you know.

name: World's Biggest Problems Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of some of the world's most pressing problems: global health, animal welfare, and existential risks to humanity.

name: Your Greatest Sources of Pleasure
description: Discover what brings you the most joy and personal life satisfaction and review how to experience them more often.

name: Your Primal World Beliefs
description: Explore the beliefs shaping your worldview: do you see safety or danger, meaning or emptiness, curiosity or boredom?

name: Your Quarterly Life Review
description: Most of us can benefit from regularly reflecting on our lives, but few people make the time to do so. Let's make that easier!
